ygData.subject: Re: Soul Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: I can pretty much guarantee that the Soul Reaver is real. I ve seen it being auctioned off before, but I never knew it was a better version of the Dark Reaver
ygData.messageBody:
I can pretty much guarantee that the Soul Reaver is real. I've seen it being
auctioned off before, but I never knew it was a better version of the Dark
Reaver (who would of thought that there is a better sword than the Dark
Reaver?). But only one SK is seen with it because it is a No-Trade item.


>Hmm, it very well could be. But I am inclined to believe that he just saw
a
>dark reaver and mistook it for something else... I dunno. If it does exist
>that would be very cool... but it might just be another rumor. I have
heard
>of several other swords with names like sould flayer and other names with
>about the same wording. I would like to hear more about how this developes
>however.
